codes.CTAM: Mandate suspended due to amendment of the contract.
codes.CTCA: Mandate suspended due to cancellation of the contract, requested by the debtor.
codes.CTEX: Mandate suspended due to the contract that expired.
codes.MCFC: Mandate suspended as final collection took place.
codes.MCOC: Mandate suspended as the once off collection took place.
codes.MSUC: Mandate suspended after 7 consecutive unsuccessful collections.

description: Specifies the external mandate suspension reason code in the format of character string with a maximum length of 4 characters.
name: ExternalMandateSuspensionReason1Code
